ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 6
ComicInfo.Summary: Chapter 6: Two-Face and the surviving Task Force Z members rescue Red Hood from KGBeast, and then the team is confronted by Batman. In flashback, we learn the origins of the Lazarus Resin, and how it was developed by a team working for Powers International that included Resurrection Man Mitch Shelley and Mr. Bloom, before Mr. Bloom betrayed the team and put his own plan into motion.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 18:42:36. [CVDB912142] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:49:43. [Issue ID 2379251]
